price_text: UNDER OFFER - UNDER OFFER BY DANNY SHARRETT
description:
Conveniently situated towards the front of Maddington's Mulberry Mews complex is this modern two bedroom, one bathroom villa. Having undergone renovation work 5 years with a new kitchen and bathroom, this tidy home is perfect for downsizers, first home-buyers, FIFO workers and investors alike. Connected to neighbouring villas by the carport wall only, this exciting property is one well- worth an inspection.

Enjoying a prominent Attfield Street address, the location offers convenient access to a long list of desired amenities. Maddington Central is a short 500m away and is home to many well-known retailers and high-profile supermarkets. Both Albany Highway and Kenwick Link are just 200m down the road providing a gateway to the Maddington and Kenwick CBD's – a hive of business activity including Bunnings hardware, local car yards, gyms and casual eateries amongst, to name a few.

FEATURES:
* Fully renovated kitchen offering stone bench tops, stainless steel stove and range hood plus dishwasher and overhead cupboards with frosted glass fascias.
* Lounge room living area located to the front of the unit with easy care tiled flooring and ceiling fan.
* Separate dining behind the kitchen with sliding door access to the patio.
* Master bedroom enjoying a forward facing position with sliding mirrored robes, ceiling fans and glossy timber look flooring.
* Built-in robe and timber-look floors feature in the second bedroom.
* Modern bathroom undergone a recent renovation with floor-to-ceiling tiles, separate bath, shower, and vanity.
* Secure parking in the single carport behind a roller door and under the main roof.
* Split system air conditioning can be enjoyed in the main living area.
* Internal laundry with glass sliding door providing access to the back courtyard.
* Brick paved patio outdoor living space overlooking a grassed courtyard.
* Good-sized garden shed providing room for extra storage.

It doesn't get much better than this – great location, modern renovation, easy care gardens, and low maintenance living. If you're looking for a hassle-free lifestyle or a tidy villa to add to your property portfolio, be sure to stop by 2/2 Attfield Street, Maddington. Viewing will not disappoint, so contact Danny Sharrett on 0421 088 467 and secure yours today.

PROPERTY INFORMATION
Council Rates: $387.50 per qtr
Water Rates: $225.75 per qtr
Strata Rates: $682.15 per qtr
Block Size: 217sqm
Zoning: R30
Build Year: 1989
Dwelling Type: Villa
Floor Plan: Unavailable
